description: Evidence Pack v0.1: Accounting harness run via target.command wrapper; commands.sh renders placeholders to absolute paths.

command:
import json,shutil,subprocess,sys
from pathlib import Path
input_path=Path(sys.argv[1]).resolve(); out_dir=Path(sys.argv[2]).resolve(); runtime_root=Path(sys.argv[3]).resolve(); agent_id=str(sys.argv[4]); harness=Path(sys.argv[5]).resolve()
cmd=[sys.executable, str(harness), '--runtime-root', str(runtime_root), '--agent-id', agent_id, '--case-pdf', str(input_path)]
res=subprocess.run(cmd, shell=False)
out_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
# Ensure at least one JSON exists under <out_dir> for eval-run determinism.
harness_result=input_path.parent/'accounting_harness_result.json'
if harness_result.exists():
    shutil.copy2(harness_result, out_dir/'accounting_harness_result.json')
else:
    (out_dir/'accounting_harness_result.json').write_text(json.dumps({'missing': str(harness_result)})+'\n', encoding='utf-8')
raise SystemExit(int(res.returncode))
